a3ComDvmrpCacheTime.name: a3ComDvmrpCacheTime
a3ComDvmrpCacheTime.description: This object specifies the time in seconds a (source, group) entry is kept in the forwarding table. The entry can be kept within 5 minutes to 1 day.

a3ComDvmrpPrune.name: a3ComDvmrpPrune
a3ComDvmrpPrune.description: If this object is set to enabled(1), then prune is on when running multicast routing with DVMRP protocol. If is is set to disabled(2), then prune is turned off.

a3ComDvmrpUpdateTime.name: a3ComDvmrpUpdateTime
a3ComDvmrpUpdateTime.description: This object specifies the time interval in seconds that Route Report containing complete routing table is sent. It also derives Route Expiration time which is set to three times value of this object, Garbage Collection time which is set to five times value of this object, Neighbor Expiration time which is set to two times value of this object plus 20 seconds and Leaf Confirmation time which is set to three times value of this object plus 20 seconds.

a3ComDvmrpMospfPolicy.name: a3ComDvmrpMospfPolicy
a3ComDvmrpMospfPolicy.description: If this object is set to mospf(1), the system will import the route source from MOSPF domain into DVMRP. The route source is controlled by the object a3ComDvmrpMospfTable

a3ComDvmrpDestGroupPolicy.name: a3ComDvmrpDestGroupPolicy
a3ComDvmrpDestGroupPolicy.description: This object is used to control data packets forward to MOSPF domain. If this object is set to destGroup(1), data packet will be checked with object a3ComDvmrpDestGroupTable, which function as a filter, before being forwarded to MOSPF domain. If this object is set to noDestGroup(2), data packet is forwarded to MOSPF domain without any checking.

a3ComDvmrpPortTable.name: a3ComDvmrpPortTable
a3ComDvmrpPortTable.description: This table contains entries of parameters associated with every port or tunnel.

a3ComDvmrpPortEntry.name: a3ComDvmrpPortEntry
a3ComDvmrpPortEntry.description: Each entry contains information for a spcified port or tunnel.

a3ComDvmrpPortIndex.name: a3ComDvmrpPortIndex
a3ComDvmrpPortIndex.description: The port number or tunnel ID of which this entry applies. The tunnel ID starts with 1025 and end with 1056, i.e. total tunnel number is limited to 32.

a3ComDvmrpPortControl.name: a3ComDvmrpPortControl
a3ComDvmrpPortControl.description: This object allows the multicast routing to run with DVMRP or not.

a3ComDvmrpPortMetric.name: a3ComDvmrpPortMetric
a3ComDvmrpPortMetric.description: This object specifies the cost to the given port or tunnel. A value of 32 is considered 'infinity'.

a3ComDvmrpPortRateLimit.name: a3ComDvmrpPortRateLimit
a3ComDvmrpPortRateLimit.description: This object specifies the bandwidth in Kbits/second that will be allocated for the multicast datagrams traffic. If set the value to 0 then the full bandwidth of the port will be applied.

a3ComDvmrpPortAggregateCtrl.name: a3ComDvmrpPortAggregateCtrl
a3ComDvmrpPortAggregateCtrl.description: This object controls the way to advertise routes.

a3ComDvmrpBoundaryAddrTable.name: a3ComDvmrpBoundaryAddrTable
a3ComDvmrpBoundaryAddrTable.description: This table contains multicast addresses to be scoped for each port or tunnel.

a3ComDvmrpBoundaryAddrEntry.name: a3ComDvmrpBoundaryAddrEntry
a3ComDvmrpBoundaryAddrEntry.description: Each entry contains a single or a range of multicast addresses to be scoped over a specific port or tunnel.

a3ComDvmrpBoundaryAddrPort.name: a3ComDvmrpBoundaryAddrPort
a3ComDvmrpBoundaryAddrPort.description: The port or tunnel number to which this entry applies.

a3ComDvmrpBoundaryAddrIpAddr.name: a3ComDvmrpBoundaryAddrIpAddr
a3ComDvmrpBoundaryAddrIpAddr.description: This allows you to configure a single or a set of multicast addresses to be scoped that they do not get forwarded beyond a boundary router.

a3ComDvmrpBoundaryAddrMask.name: a3ComDvmrpBoundaryAddrMask
a3ComDvmrpBoundaryAddrMask.description: This is the subnet mask associated with a3ComDvmrpBoundaryIpAddr of this entry. If this is not specified, the value 255.255.255.255 is used.

a3ComDvmrpBoundaryAddrStatus.name: a3ComDvmrpBoundaryAddrStatus
a3ComDvmrpBoundaryAddrStatus.description: This object is used to add and delete entries in this table. See the definition of RowStatus for detail.

a3ComDvmrpMospfTable.name: a3ComDvmrpMospfTable
a3ComDvmrpMospfTable.description: This table contains a list of source subnet in MOSPF domain.

a3ComDvmrpMospfEntry.name: a3ComDvmrpMospfEntry
a3ComDvmrpMospfEntry.description: Each entry contains a source subnet in MOSPF domain to be advertised or not to be advertised to the DVMRP domain.

a3ComDvmrpMospfIpMask.name: a3ComDvmrpMospfIpMask
a3ComDvmrpMospfIpMask.description: This is subnet mask associated with a3ComDvmrpMospfIpAddr. It is a number of contiguous leading 1s, i.e. if the value is 1, it indicates the subnet mask is 128.0.0.0, or if the value is 8 then the subnet mask is 255.0.0.0.

a3ComDvmrpMospfMetric.name: a3ComDvmrpMospfMetric
a3ComDvmrpMospfMetric.description: The routing metric to this source subnet. It ranges from 1 to 31.

a3ComDvmrpMospfAction.name: a3ComDvmrpMospfAction
a3ComDvmrpMospfAction.description: If this object is set to aggregate(1), then this source subnet, if learned from MOSPF, is advertised to DVMRP domain in aggregate form. If this object is set to individual(2), then this source subnet, if learned from MOSPF, is advertised to DVMRP domain as it is. Otherwise, the route will not be advertised if the object is set to reject(3).

a3ComDvmrpMospfStatus.name: a3ComDvmrpMospfStatus
a3ComDvmrpMospfStatus.description: This object is used to add and delete entries in this table. See the definition of RowStatus for detail.

a3ComDvmrpNeighborTable.name: a3ComDvmrpNeighborTable
a3ComDvmrpNeighborTable.description: This table contains a list of neighbors entries for each X.25 or Frame-Relay networks.

a3ComDvmrpNeighborEntry.name: a3ComDvmrpNeighborEntry
a3ComDvmrpNeighborEntry.description: Each entry contains a single X.25 DTE address or a Frame-Relay DLCI.

a3ComDvmrpNeighborPort.name: a3ComDvmrpNeighborPort
a3ComDvmrpNeighborPort.description: The port number to which this entry applies.

a3ComDvmrpNeighborType.name: a3ComDvmrpNeighborType
a3ComDvmrpNeighborType.description: This object specifies the media type of the port.

a3ComDvmrpNeighborAddr.name: a3ComDvmrpNeighborAddr
a3ComDvmrpNeighborAddr.description: This object specifies an X.25 DTE address or a Frame-Relay DLCI.

a3ComDvmrpNeighborStatus.name: a3ComDvmrpNeighborStatus
a3ComDvmrpNeighborStatus.description: This object is used to add and delete entries in this table. See the definition of RowStatus for detail.

a3ComDvmrpTunnelTable.name: a3ComDvmrpTunnelTable
a3ComDvmrpTunnelTable.description: This table contains entries of tunnel.

a3ComDvmrpTunnelEntry.name: a3ComDvmrpTunnelEntry
a3ComDvmrpTunnelEntry.description: Each entry contains parameters associated with a specific tunnel.

a3ComDvmrpTunnelId.name: a3ComDvmrpTunnelId
a3ComDvmrpTunnelId.description: The ID number of which this entry applies. Tunnel ID starts with 1025 and ends with 1056.

a3ComDvmrpTunnelLocalIp.name: a3ComDvmrpTunnelLocalIp
a3ComDvmrpTunnelLocalIp.description: This object specifies the IP address of local end of a tunnel. It must be one of system's directly connected subnet.

a3ComDvmrpTunnelRemoteIp.name: a3ComDvmrpTunnelRemoteIp
a3ComDvmrpTunnelRemoteIp.description: This object specifies the IP address of remote end of a tunnel.

a3ComDvmrpTunnelTtl.name: a3ComDvmrpTunnelTtl
a3ComDvmrpTunnelTtl.description: This object specifies the value to be put in IP packet's TTL field when transmits packets through a tunnel.

a3ComDvmrpTunnelStatus.name: a3ComDvmrpTunnelStatus
a3ComDvmrpTunnelStatus.description: This object is used to add and delete entries in this table. See the definition of RowStatus for detail.

a3ComDvmrpAggreExceptTable.name: a3ComDvmrpAggreExceptTable
a3ComDvmrpAggreExceptTable.description: The table contains list of subnets not to be aggregated.

a3ComDvmrpAggreExceptEntry.name: a3ComDvmrpAggreExceptEntry
a3ComDvmrpAggreExceptEntry.description: Each entry contains a range of subnets.

a3ComDvmrpAggreExceptIpAddr.name: a3ComDvmrpAggreExceptIpAddr
a3ComDvmrpAggreExceptIpAddr.description: This object specifies the IP subnet address.

a3ComDvmrpAggreExceptIpMask.name: a3ComDvmrpAggreExceptIpMask
a3ComDvmrpAggreExceptIpMask.description: The subnet mask of ccsIpDvmrpAggreExceptIpAddr. It is an integer value representing number of consecutive leading 1s. i.e. if the value is 1, then the subnet mask is 128.0.0.0, if the value is 8 then the subnet mask is 255.0.0.0.

a3ComDvmrpAggreExceptStatus.name: a3ComDvmrpAggreExceptStatus
a3ComDvmrpAggreExceptStatus.description: This object is used to add and delete entries in this table. See the definition of RowStatus for detail.

a3ComDvmrpAggreRangeTable.name: a3ComDvmrpAggreRangeTable
a3ComDvmrpAggreRangeTable.description: The table contains range of routes to be aggregated.

a3ComDvmrpAggreRangeEntry.name: a3ComDvmrpAggreRangeEntry
a3ComDvmrpAggreRangeEntry.description: Each entry contains a range of routes.

a3ComDvmrpAggreRangeIpAddr.name: a3ComDvmrpAggreRangeIpAddr
a3ComDvmrpAggreRangeIpAddr.description: This object specifies the IP subnet address.

a3ComDvmrpAggreRangeIpMask.name: a3ComDvmrpAggreRangeIpMask
a3ComDvmrpAggreRangeIpMask.description: The subnet mask of ccsIpDvmrpAggreRangeIpAddr. It is an integer value representing number of consecutive leading 1s. i.e. if the value is 1, then the subnet mask is 128.0.0.0, if the value is 8 then the subnet mask is 255.0.0.0.

a3ComDvmrpAggreRangeMetric.name: a3ComDvmrpAggreRangeMetric
a3ComDvmrpAggreRangeMetric.description: This object specifies the cost to the above subnet. If set this object to value 0, the metric associated with the aggregate route to be advertised will pick up the best one among all the aggregated routes.

a3ComDvmrpAggreRangeStatus.name: a3ComDvmrpAggreRangeStatus
a3ComDvmrpAggreRangeStatus.description: This object is used to add and delete entries in this table. See the definition of RowStatus for detail.

a3ComDvmrpDestGroupTable.name: a3ComDvmrpDestGroupTable
a3ComDvmrpDestGroupTable.description: The table contains destination groups to be or not to be forwarded to MOSPF domain. This table will take effect only if object a3ComDvmrpDestGroupPolicy is set to 'destGroup (1)'.

a3ComDvmrpDestGroupEntry.name: a3ComDvmrpDestGroupEntry
a3ComDvmrpDestGroupEntry.description: Each entry contains a destination group to be or not to be forwarded to MOSPF domain.

a3ComDvmrpDestGroupIpAddr.name: a3ComDvmrpDestGroupIpAddr
a3ComDvmrpDestGroupIpAddr.description: This object specifies the destination group IP address, the first byte in decimal must be in the range of 224 to 239.

a3ComDvmrpDestGroupIpMask.name: a3ComDvmrpDestGroupIpMask
a3ComDvmrpDestGroupIpMask.description: This is subnet mask associated with a3ComDvmrpDestGroupIpAddr. It is a number of contiguous leading 1s, i.e. if the value is 1, it indicates the subnet mask is 128.0.0.0, or if the value is 8 then the subnet mask is 255.0.0.0.

a3ComDvmrpDestGroupAction.name: a3ComDvmrpDestGroupAction
a3ComDvmrpDestGroupAction.description: This object specifies if this destination group needs to be forwarded to MOSPF domain. If set to 'accept (1)', the group is forwarded to MOSPF domain; if set to 'reject (2)' then the group is filtered out.

a3ComDvmrpDestGroupStatus.name: a3ComDvmrpDestGroupStatus
a3ComDvmrpDestGroupStatus.description: This object is used to add and delete entries in this table. See the definition of RowStatus for detail.

a3ComDvmrpRouteTable.name: a3ComDvmrpRouteTable
a3ComDvmrpRouteTable.description: This table contains multicast route information.

a3ComDvmrpRouteEntry.name: a3ComDvmrpRouteEntry
a3ComDvmrpRouteEntry.description: Each entry contains route information to a specific subnet or source.

a3ComDvmrpRouteSource.name: a3ComDvmrpRouteSource
a3ComDvmrpRouteSource.description: The source IP address of this route.

a3ComDvmrpRouteMask.name: a3ComDvmrpRouteMask
a3ComDvmrpRouteMask.description: This object is logical-anded with the source address before comparing to the value in previous object a3ComDvmrpRouteSource.

a3ComDvmrpRoutePreHop.name: a3ComDvmrpRoutePreHop
a3ComDvmrpRoutePreHop.description: The IP address of the upstream router of this route.

a3ComDvmrpRouteMetric.name: a3ComDvmrpRouteMetric
a3ComDvmrpRouteMetric.description: The routing metric of this route. It's routing-protocol dependenable, for DVMRP, the metric should be in range 1 to 31. The value 32 is considered 'infinity' or unreachable.

a3ComDvmrpRoutePort.name: a3ComDvmrpRoutePort
a3ComDvmrpRoutePort.description: The port number identifies from which this route comes.

a3ComDvmrpRouteProtocol.name: a3ComDvmrpRouteProtocol
a3ComDvmrpRouteProtocol.description: The routing algorithm to which this route applies.

a3ComDvmrpRouteTtl.name: a3ComDvmrpRouteTtl
a3ComDvmrpRouteTtl.description: The time in seconds this route was last updated.

a3ComDvmrpRouteChild.name: a3ComDvmrpRouteChild
a3ComDvmrpRouteChild.description: This object identifies ports that connect to child subtree of the multicast tree rooted at a3ComDvmrpRouteSource. Each octet, except the first one which contains a value specified length of this object, contains a bit map of 8 ports. The first (should say the second) octet specifies ports from 1 to 8, the next octet specifies ports 9 to 16, ... etc. The most significant bit in each octet represents the lowest port, the least significant bit represents the highest port among those 8 ports. If the bit is set then the corresponding port connects to a child subtree, otherwise the corresponding port does not connect to a child subtree. The tunnel ports does not include in this object, it is specified in next, a3ComDvmrpRouteChildTunnel object.

a3ComDvmrpRouteChildTunnel.name: a3ComDvmrpRouteChildTunnel
a3ComDvmrpRouteChildTunnel.description: This object is the same as above but includes tunnel ports only. The first (should say the second) octet specifies ports from 1025 (for tunnel port 1) to 1032, the next octet specifies ports 1033 to 1040, ... etc.

a3ComDvmrpRouteLeaf.name: a3ComDvmrpRouteLeaf
a3ComDvmrpRouteLeaf.description: This objec identifies ports that connect to leaf subnet of the multicast tree rooted at a3ComDvmrpRouteSource. The value meaning within each octet is the same as that of a3ComDvmrpRouteChild, except the bit set means the corresponding port connects to a leaf. This object does not include tunnel ports too.

a3ComDvmrpRouteLeafTunnel.name: a3ComDvmrpRouteLeafTunnel
a3ComDvmrpRouteLeafTunnel.description: This objec is the same as a3ComDvmrpRouteLeaf object but includes tunnel ports only.

a3ComDvmrpForwardTable.name: a3ComDvmrpForwardTable
a3ComDvmrpForwardTable.description: This table contains information of each (source, group) pair.

a3ComDvmrpForwardEntry.name: a3ComDvmrpForwardEntry
a3ComDvmrpForwardEntry.description: Each entry contains forwarding information for a specific (source, group) pair.

a3ComDvmrpForwardSource.name: a3ComDvmrpForwardSource
a3ComDvmrpForwardSource.description: This object specifies root's IP address of this (source, group) multicast distribution tree.

a3ComDvmrpForwardGroup.name: a3ComDvmrpForwardGroup
a3ComDvmrpForwardGroup.description: This object specifies the destination multicast group address of this (source, group) multicast distribution tree.

a3ComDvmrpForwardTtl.name: a3ComDvmrpForwardTtl
a3ComDvmrpForwardTtl.description: This object specifies the time in seconds left for this (source, group) entry to stay in the forwarding table. When this value reaches 0, this (source, group) entry is deleted from the table.

a3ComDvmrpForwardInPort.name: a3ComDvmrpForwardInPort
a3ComDvmrpForwardInPort.description: This object specifies the incoming port for the multicast datagrams from the source a3ComDvmrpForwardSource.

a3ComDvmrpForwardOutPorts.name: a3ComDvmrpForwardOutPorts
a3ComDvmrpForwardOutPorts.description: This object specifies ports to which multicast datagrams belonging to this (source, group) pair to be forwarded. The value in each octet contains a bit maps of 8 ports, that the significant bit represents the lowest port and the least significant bit represent the highest port. The first octet represents ports 1 to 8, the next octet represents ports 9 to 16, ..., etc. If the bit value is set then the corresponding port will have multicast datagrams to be forwarded. The tunnel ports mapping is put in the next a3ComDvmrpForwardOutPortsTunnel object.

a3ComDvmrpForwardOutPortsTunnel.name: a3ComDvmrpForwardOutPortsTunnel
a3ComDvmrpForwardOutPortsTunnel.description: This object is the same as a3ComDvmrpForwardOutPorts object but includes tunnel ports mapping only.

a3ComDvmrpForwardScoped.name: a3ComDvmrpForwardScoped
a3ComDvmrpForwardScoped.description: This object specifies if it is a boundary port. If the value of this object is yes(1), it means multicast traffic will not be forwarded on the scoped address, specified in 3ComDvmrpForwardGroup, on this port.

a3ComDvmrpForwardPruneSent.name: a3ComDvmrpForwardPruneSent
a3ComDvmrpForwardPruneSent.description: This object specifies if a Prune message has been sent to its upstream router. A prune message is sent when router wants to leave the multicast delivery tree associated with this (source, group) pair.

a3ComDvmrpNbrRouterTable.name: a3ComDvmrpNbrRouterTable
a3ComDvmrpNbrRouterTable.description: This table contains information of each neighboring router.

a3ComDvmrpNbrRouterEntry.name: a3ComDvmrpNbrRouterEntry
a3ComDvmrpNbrRouterEntry.description: Each entry contains neighboring router's IP address, DVMRP version, generation ID, expiration time and status.

a3ComDvmrpNbrRouterPort.name: a3ComDvmrpNbrRouterPort
a3ComDvmrpNbrRouterPort.description: The port number or tunnel ID of which this entry applies.

a3ComDvmrpNbrRouterIpAddr.name: a3ComDvmrpNbrRouterIpAddr
a3ComDvmrpNbrRouterIpAddr.description: The IP address of this neighboring router.

a3ComDvmrpNbrRouterGenId.name: a3ComDvmrpNbrRouterGenId
a3ComDvmrpNbrRouterGenId.description: The generation ID of this neighboring router.

a3ComDvmrpNbrRouterVerProtocol.name: a3ComDvmrpNbrRouterVerProtocol
a3ComDvmrpNbrRouterVerProtocol.description: The version of DVMRP protocol that this neighboring router is running.

a3ComDvmrpNbrRouterVerMrouted.name: a3ComDvmrpNbrRouterVerMrouted
a3ComDvmrpNbrRouterVerMrouted.description: The version of 'mrouted' that this neighboring router is running.

a3ComDvmrpNbrRouterTtl.name: a3ComDvmrpNbrRouterTtl
a3ComDvmrpNbrRouterTtl.description: The time in seconds left for this neighboring router. When the value reaches 0, this entry is deleted from the table.

a3ComDvmrpNbrRouterLeafStatus.name: a3ComDvmrpNbrRouterLeafStatus
a3ComDvmrpNbrRouterLeafStatus.description: This object specifies if this neighboring router is a leaf node.

a3ComDvmrpNbrRouterPruneStatus.name: a3ComDvmrpNbrRouterPruneStatus
a3ComDvmrpNbrRouterPruneStatus.description: This object specifies if this neighboring router supports DVMRP prune.

a3ComDvmrpNbrRouterGenIdStatus.name: a3ComDvmrpNbrRouterGenIdStatus
a3ComDvmrpNbrRouterGenIdStatus.description: This object specifies if this neighboring router provides generation ID and its router list in the DVMRP probe packet.

a3ComDvmrpNbrRouterMtraceStatus.name: a3ComDvmrpNbrRouterMtraceStatus
a3ComDvmrpNbrRouterMtraceStatus.description: This object specifies if this neighboring router supports multicast trace route.

comments: Produced by pysmi-0.3.4 at Tue Apr 20 16:33:37 2021
